mapper.select: select * from ( select company_username username from company union ALL select username username from user) t where u=#{username}
mapper.insert: insert into user(username, password, name, email, phone_number, created_at) values (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phoneNumber}, now())
mapper.update: update user set username=#{user.username}, password=#{user.password}, email= #{user.email}, phone_number=#{user.phoneNumber} where user_id=#{id}
